description: This file contains utility functions related to configuration file detection, package data retrieval, plugin and preset resolution, mainly for a Babel-like environment in a browser context. It defines functions for locating configs, loading plugins/presets, and handling config file paths, but most functions throw errors or return null, indicating incomplete or stub implementations.

methods.name: export function findConfigUpwards( findConfigUpwards
methods.description: Attempts to find a configuration file upwards from the specified root directory, but currently returns null indicating no config found.

methods.name: findPackageData
methods.description: Generator that yields package data for a given filepath, currently returns a stub object with default values.

methods.name: findRelativeConfig
methods.description: Generator that attempts to find a relative config given package data, environment name, and caller metadata, returning a null config.

methods.name: findRootConfig
methods.description: Generator that attempts to find a root configuration file in a directory, currently always returns null.

methods.name: loadConfig
methods.description: Loads a configuration file given its name and directory, but throws an error in browser context.

methods.name: resolveShowConfigPath
methods.description: Resolves the path to display the show config, currently returns null.

methods.name: export function resolvePlugin(name: string, dirname: string): Resolved | null { resolvePlugin
methods.description: Resolves a plugin by name and directory; always returns null.

methods.name: export function resolvePreset(name: string, dirname: string): Resolved | null { resolvePreset
methods.description: Resolves a preset by name and directory; always returns null.

methods.name: export function loadPlugin( loadPlugin
methods.description: Attempts to load a plugin, throws an error in browser context.

methods.name: export function loadPreset( loadPreset
methods.description: Attempts to load a preset, throws an error in browser context.

ctags.name: resolvePlugin
ctags.pattern: /^export function resolvePlugin(name: string, dirname: string): Resolved | null {$/

ctags.name: resolvePreset
ctags.pattern: /^export function resolvePreset(name: string, dirname: string): Resolved | null {$/
